mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_detail (orderId, productId, productName, productImg, specification, sellingPrice, quantity, subTotal, rating, reviewDetail) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{productId}, #{productName}, #{productImg}, #{specification}, #{sellingPrice}, #{quantity}, #{subTotal}, #{rating}, #{reviewDetail})
mapper.select: SELECT od.detailId, od.productId, od.rating, od.reviewDetail, om.createTime AS createTime, u.userId, u.username, u.avatar FROM order_detail od JOIN order_master om ON om.orderId = od.orderId JOIN user u ON u.userId = om.userId WHERE od.productId = #{productId} AND od.rating IS NOT NULL ORDER BY om.createTime DESC
